description: Christopher Scott brings unsuspecting buds Derek Cameron, Paul Morgan and Damon Wolf to the club, where they quickly find themselves the slaves of leather-clad dominators Mike Branson, Jeff Palmer, Travis Wade, Buck Meadows, Brian Cruise and star in the making Michel Lucas. The action is fast and furious, one of the best orgies ever filmed. Cameron bottoms his heart out, while Palmer and Wade help boss the boys around. After a double penetration with Cameron getting fucked by Cruise and Palmer, the men shoot their loads.
title: The Chosen, Scene #02
